title: Manage Surge Pricing During an Event
description: After a concert ends, demand for rides skyrockets. The system must manage dynamic 'surge' pricing to attract more drivers to the area.

tasks.description: The system detects a rapid increase in ride requests and a low number of available drivers in a specific geographic zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies a supply/demand imbalance.

tasks.description: The system automatically applies a surge multiplier (e.g., 2.5x) to fares in that zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Surge pricing is activated for the concert zone.

tasks.description: The system sends a notification to drivers in nearby zones, informing them of the high earnings potential in the surge zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Drivers are incentivized to move towards the area of high demand.
